item.title: Clonner 1.0.17 - Release
item.description:
What's New in Clonner 1.0.17

  • Add warning for local changes before branch switch in RepositoryService
  • Refactor logging and repository cloning logic for improved clarity and error handling. Enhanced status tag extraction to avoid duplicate brackets and streamlined repository cloning with token management. Updated progress logging to categorize messages more effectively.
  • Update version to 1.0.16 for release
  • update
  • migration
  • clonner updates
  • Update version to 1.0.13 for release
  • cleaning
  • Update version to 1.0.12 for release
